summary: Completed comprehensive testing of VoltX Browser application. Fixed critical frontend runtime error and verified all core browser features including authentication, tab management, bookmarks, history, themes, study mode, game mode, split screen, and notes functionality.
passed_tests: Address bar navigation with URL and search functionality
Search shortcuts (/yt for YouTube, /wiki for Wikipedia)
Bookmark management (add, view, delete) with MongoDB persistence
History tracking and clearing with MongoDB persistence
Settings panel with all 5 theme switching (White Gold, Black Gold, Tech Dark, Space Dark, Eco Green)
Session snapshots (save and restore browsing sessions)
Study Mode with Pomodoro timer functionality
Quick Notes Sidebar with text input
All backend API endpoints (15/15 tests passed)
